name: Paulie
text: [On Play] (2) (You may rest the specified number of DON!! cards in your Cost Area): Add up to 1 DON!! card from your DON!! deck and set it as active. Then, if you have 8 or more DON!! in play, K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's Character's with a cost of 4 or less.

effect.text: Add up to 1 DON!! card from your DON!! deck and set it as active. Then, if you have 8 or more DON!! in play, K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's Character's with a cost of 4 or less.

meta.notes: Rarity 'C' confirmed from the bottom right corner of the card.
